definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Taste the cornflakes and the nuts.
It's a wonder, really, the Queen didn't choke on her Cornflakes.
sentences.chinese: 这真是奇迹，女王在吃玉米片早餐时没有呛到。

sentences.english: Some fasted, though others ate nachos.
sentences.chinese: 他们要么只吃了玉米片，要么完全禁食。

sentences.english: I ate popcorn, cornflakes, banana and lollipop.
sentences.chinese: 我吃了爆米花，玉米片，香蕉和棒棒糖。

sentences.english: I love cornflake, it is nice and crispy.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢玉米片，又脆又好吃。

sentences.english: Pouring Corn Flakes into a bowl at the age of four without asking permission from my mum.
sentences.chinese: 四岁的时候未经母亲许可把玉米片倒到碗里面。

sentences.english: Corn chips have corn, oil and salt.
sentences.chinese: 比如，炸玉米片，买那种只含玉米，油和盐的。

sentences.english: To start, I'm going to get the nachos (3) , and then a double cheeseburger (4) .
sentences.chinese: 我要来个烤玉米片，然后再要一个双层乳酪的汉堡包。

sentences.english: He chopped a banana, to put on top of the girls’ cornflakes.
sentences.chinese: 他剁碎了一只香蕉，要放在女孩儿们的脆玉米片上。

sentences.english: I eat Corn Flakes for breakfast each morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早餐都吃玉米片。

sentences.english: A blueberry pancake, corn flakes, and a glass of orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 阿蓝莓饼，玉米片，和一杯橙汁。

sentences.english: The children seem to have gone off cornflakes for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们似乎对玉米片做早餐不感兴趣了。

sentences.english: A second helping of Corn Flakes could save your life.
sentences.chinese: 第二份玉米片对救你一命是有帮助的。

sentences.english: I had cornflakes with milk and sugar for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我早餐有牛奶和糖的玉米片。

sentences.english: Salt-free cornflakes, for instance, would be well nigh inedible.
sentences.chinese: 例如无盐玉米片变得几乎无法入口。

definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
